pkgmetadata.longdescription: Process CBASS-Derived PAM Data // Tools to process CBASS-derived PAM data efficiently. Minimal requirements are PAM-based photosynthetic efficiency data (or data from any other continuous variable that changes with temperature, e.g. relative bleaching scores) from 4 coral samples (nubbins) subjected to 4 temperature profiles of at least 2 colonies from 1 coral species from 1 site. Please refer to the following CBASS (Coral Bleaching Automated Stress System) papers for in- depth information regarding CBASS acute thermal stress assays, experimental design considerations, and ED5/ED50/ED95 thermal parameters: Nicolas R. Evensen et al. (2023) doi:10.1002/lom3.10555 Christian R. Voolstra et al. (2020) doi:10.1111/gcb.15148 Christian R. Voolstra et al. (2025) doi:10.1146/annurev-marine-032223-024511.
